Narrative:
Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s Gangubai Kathiawadi, starring Alia Bhatt in the eponymous role, released on Friday in theatres. The film, which was postponed multiple times amid the pandemic, was earlier premiered at the Berlin International Film Festival to positive reviews.

Alia primarily opted for sarees to promote Gangubai Kathiawadi.  The graceful piece featured roses in the shades of red, pink and yellow printed on the pleats and the border. The actress paired the saree with a floral blouse and accessorised minimally with a pair of heavy silver jhumkas. She tied her hair in a bun with white roses.
Title: Alia Bhatt's look from Gangubai Kathiawadi promotions,
